modName: Myrgiol the Sturdy - Standalone BBW body
summary: A young woman with her own unique armor can be found at Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
A young woman setting out on her own finds herself in Ivarstead. While she would like to explore all of Tamriel, she's come to the realization that she can't do it alone.

Fun facts:
Level 6-80
Sultry Voice
Combat Barbarian
2 Handed Hammer
Any Crime


She is skilled in two handed weapons (favoring the hammer) and a woman of few words.
Have her carry anything but armor... trust me it won't go well.
Clipping may be an issue for some of her clothing(what she's carrying) any clothing that isn't hers will certainly clip.
While this companion isn't 100% she's the best I can make on a 4 year old 'puter without a graphics card. Any feedback I get is Invaluable. Tell me what you like and hate, I'll work with ya.
If anyone likes the merchant armor or bar dress let me know and I'll make them standalone.

Credits.

Razorwire [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10111/?]Chubby Races for Skyrim - BBW[/url]
-Farm Clothes 01 (Baka7kami)
-RobidyBobidy
-CherryHotaling
-Caliente
